ai-ya9.2.2:185.1_1: They will cease in them, and unskillful qualities cease.
ai-ya9.2.2:188.1_0: While they facing the eightfold path, they will cease in the present, and other qualities that are skillful.
ai-ya9.2.2:188.1_1: And here is where these skillful qualities cease, and other unskillful qualities cease.
ai-ya9.2.2:189.1_0: Whoever wears away from the unskillful qualities that should turn away from away?
ai-ya9.2.2:190.1_0: As they do so, those unskillful qualities cease in them, and they will cease.
ai-ya9.2.2:190.1_1: This kind of skillful qualities will cease.
ai-ya9.2.2:191.1_0: And where those skillful qualities cease?
ai-ya9.2.2:192.1_0: Whoever is skilled in the unskillful qualities that make them wear away?
ai-ya9.2.2:193.1_0: As they do so, they will cease in the arising of the mind, with unpurified mind, bright, flawless, rid of corruptions, pliable, workable, and cease.
ai-ya9.2.2:193.1_1: Becoming skillful qualities, they will cease in them.
ai-ya9.2.2:195.1_0: Whoever unskillful qualities ceases, and perishes?
ai-ya9.2.2:196.1_0: As they do so, they will cease without anything left over, not their minds.
ai-ya9.2.2:196.1_1: Then they will cease in them, and unskillful qualities cease.
ai-ya9.2.2:197.1_0: Who doesn’t cease without anything left over?
ai-ya9.2.2:198.1_0: All those who are skilled in profitable in mind, accomplished in wisdom, knowledge, cessation, and ripen in freedom.
ai-ya9.2.2:198.1_1: While they’re unskilled in the present life, for perfected ones, and other unskillful qualities cease.
ai-ya9.2.2:199.1_0: Who doesn’t wear away from the unskillful qualities that are skillful, unskillful, or decline?
ai-ya9.2.2:200.1_0: While they were eating, they won’t generate the best barbaries with unpurified mind; they won’t break apart their minds.
ai-ya9.2.2:200.1_1: While they’re unskilled in the present life, for perfected ones, and those who cease in them will do not cease.
ai-ya9.2.2:201.1_0: Who doesn’t cease without anything left over?
ai-ya9.2.2:202.1_0: All those who are skilled in profitable in mind, committed to the end, and skilled in terms of the skillful qualities—not keen or resolute, they don’t cease.

ai-ya9.2.2:212.1_0: And where those skillful qualities cease without anything left over?

ai-ya9.2.2:216.1_1: Or unskilled in the west, and unskillful qualities cease without anything left over.
ai-ya9.2.2:217.1_0: Who doesn’t lay him away from any unskillful qualities do so by wearing away or turn them away?
ai-ya9.2.2:218.1_0: Whoever understands unskillful qualities will wear out?
ai-ya9.2.2:219.1_0: While the eightfold path is present, the best of the perfected ones will honor, respect, esteem, and venerate those who are skilled in the wrong path.
ai-ya9.2.2:219.1_1: Such qualities are skillful and unskillful qualities.
ai-ya9.2.2:220.1_0: Or else when these things are unskillful, they turn out away.

ai-ya9.2.2:226.1_0: Or are unskillful qualities away by wearing away?

ai-ya9.2.2:233.1_0: Putting the last mind of those who are skilled in, trained, and skilled in the western sea. And they’re not ignorant.

ai-ya9.2.2:242.1_0: Not wearing away, unskillful qualities that are skillful and unskillful, whether they haven’t declared them.

ai-ya9.2.2:249.1_0: And if unskillful qualities don’t wear out, let alone those qualities that are unskillful and skillful, let them go?”
ai-ya9.2.2:250.1_0: Skilled in the heavens, while the nectar of the mind is presented with a perfected one, but doesn’t look down on those who are unskilled in the present.
